chapters.title: Chapter 32: Sealed to the Flame
chapters.info: Adelorna Bastine, p. 509 (652)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She removed an angreal from the Tower storeroom without permission from the Amyrlin and kept it in her room. Alviarin found out about it, and told Elaida she needed to make an example of her while Elaida was feeling weak.
